013package org.apache.juneau.http.annotation;
014
015import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.*;
016import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArrayUtils.*;
019
020import java.lang.annotation.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
026
027/**
028 * Utility classes and methods for the {@link Header @Header} annotation.
029 *
030 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
031 * </ul>
032 */
033public class HeaderAnnotation {
034
035   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
036   // Static
037   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
038
039   /** Default value */
040   public static final Header DEFAULT = create().build();
041
042   /**
043    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
044    *
045    * @return A new builder object.
046    */
047   public static Builder create() {
048      return new Builder();
049   }
050
051   /**
052    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
053    *
054    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
055    * @return A new builder object.
056    */
057   public static Builder create(Class<?>...on) {
058      return create().on(on);
059   }
060
061   /**
062    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
063    *
064    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
065    * @return A new builder object.
066    */
067   public static Builder create(String...on) {
068      return create().on(on);
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the specified annotation contains all default values.
073    *
074    * @param a The annotation to check.
075    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the specified annotation contains all default values.
076    */
077   public static boolean empty(Header a) {
078      return a == null || DEFAULT.equals(a);
079   }
080
081   /**
082    * Finds the name from the specified lists of annotations.
083    *
084    * <p>
085    * The last matching name found is returned.
086    *
087    * @param pi The parameter.
088    * @return The last matching name, or {@link Value#empty()} if not found.
089    */
090   public static Value<String> findName(ParamInfo pi) {
091      Value<String> n = Value.empty();
092      pi.forEachAnnotation(Header.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.value()), x -> n.set(x.value()));
093      pi.forEachAnnotation(Header.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.name()), x -> n.set(x.name()));
094      return n;
095   }
096
097   /**
098    * Finds the default value from the specified list of annotations.
099    *
100    * @param pi The parameter.
101    * @return The last matching default value, or {@link Value#empty()} if not found.
102    */
103   public static Value<String> findDef(ParamInfo pi) {
104      Value<String> n = Value.empty();
105      pi.forEachAnnotation(Header.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.def()), x -> n.set(x.def()));
106      return n;
107   }
108
109   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
110   // Builder
111   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
112
113   /**
114    * Builder class.
115    *
116    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
117    *    <li class='jm'>{@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder#annotations(Annotation...)}
118    * </ul>
119    */
120   public static class Builder extends TargetedAnnotationTMFBuilder<Builder> {
121
122      Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser = HttpPartParser.Void.class;
123      Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> serializer = HttpPartSerializer.Void.class;
124      Schema schema = SchemaAnnotation.DEFAULT;
125      String name="", value="", def="";
126
127      /**
128       * Constructor.
129       */
130      protected Builder() {
131         super(Header.class);
132      }
133
134      /**
135       * Instantiates a new {@link Header @Header} object initialized with this builder.
136       *
137       * @return A new {@link Header @Header} object.
138       */
139      public Header build() {
140         return new Impl(this);
141      }
142
143      /**
144       * Sets the {@link Header#def} property on this annotation.
145       *
146       * @param value The new value for this property.
147       * @return This object.
148       */
149      public Builder def(String value) {
150         this.def = value;
151         return this;
152      }
153
154      /**
155       * Sets the {@link Header#name} property on this annotation.
156       *
157       * @param value The new value for this property.
158       * @return This object.
159       */
160      public Builder name(String value) {
161         this.name = value;
162         return this;
163      }
164
165      /**
166       * Sets the {@link Header#parser} property on this annotation.
167       *
168       * @param value The new value for this property.
169       * @return This object.
170       */
171      public Builder parser(Class<? extends HttpPartParser> value) {
172         this.parser = value;
173         return this;
174      }
175
176      /**
177       * Sets the {@link Header#schema} property on this annotation.
178       *
179       * @param value The new value for this property.
180       * @return This object.
181       */
182      public Builder schema(Schema value) {
183         this.schema = value;
184         return this;
185      }
186
187      /**
188       * Sets the {@link Header#serializer} property on this annotation.
189       *
190       * @param value The new value for this property.
191       * @return This object.
192       */
193      public Builder serializer(Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> value) {
194         this.serializer = value;
195         return this;
196      }
197
198      /**
199       * Sets the {@link Header#value} property on this annotation.
200       *
201       * @param value The new value for this property.
202       * @return This object.
203       */
204      public Builder value(String value) {
205         this.value = value;
206         return this;
207      }
208
209      // <FluentSetters>
210
211
212      // </FluentSetters>
213   }
214
215   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
216   // Implementation
217   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
218
219   private static class Impl extends TargetedAnnotationTImpl implements Header {
220
221      private final Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser;
222      private final Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> serializer;
223      private final String name, value, def;
224      private final Schema schema;
225
226      Impl(Builder b) {
227         super(b);
228         this.def = b.def;
229         this.name = b.name;
230         this.parser = b.parser;
231         this.schema = b.schema;
232         this.serializer = b.serializer;
233         this.value = b.value;
234         postConstruct();
235      }
236
237      @Override /* Header */
238      public String def() {
239         return def;
240      }
241
242      @Override /* Header */
243      public String name() {
244         return name;
245      }
246
247      @Override /* Header */
248      public Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser() {
249         return parser;
250      }
251
252      @Override /* Header */
253      public Schema schema() {
254         return schema;
255      }
256
257      @Override /* Header */
258      public Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> serializer() {
259         return serializer;
260      }
261
262      @Override /* Header */
263      public String value() {
264         return value;
265      }
266   }
267
268   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
269   // Appliers
270   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
271
272   /**
273    * Applies targeted {@link Header} annotations to a {@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder}.
274    */
275   public static class Applier extends AnnotationApplier<Header,BeanContext.Builder> {
276
277      /**
278       * Constructor.
279       *
280       * @param vr The resolver for resolving values in annotations.
281       */
282      public Applier(VarResolverSession vr) {
283         super(Header.class, BeanContext.Builder.class, vr);
284      }
285
286      @Override
287      public void apply(AnnotationInfo<Header> ai, BeanContext.Builder b) {
288         Header a = ai.inner();
289         if (isEmptyArray(a.on(), a.onClass()))
290            return;
291         b.annotations(a);
292      }
293   }
294
295   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
296   // Other
297   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
298
299   /**
300    * A collection of {@link Header @Header annotations}.
301    */
302   @Documented
303   @Target({METHOD,TYPE})
304   @Retention(RUNTIME)
305   @Inherited
306   public static @interface Array {
307
308      /**
309       * The child annotations.
310       *
311       * @return The annotation value.
312       */
313      Header[] value();
314   }
315}
